name: Circa
headline: Event marketing CRM
description: Circa is the event marketing platform built for demand gen and field marketing teams. We help sales and marketing teams work on events, everywhere and every way their customers gather.

founders.name: Alex Patriquin, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Founder & CEO of Circa YC S16

raw_markdown="[![Circa](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6579f252da1167e4a91bf142/65a16ef66da53b312f0f32a7_Circa%20Logo.svg)](http://www.circa.co/</>)[Product](http://www.circa.co/</product>)[How it works](http://www.circa.co/</how-it-works>)[Templates](http://www.circa.co/</templates>)[Pricing](http://www.circa.co/</pricing>)
[Get started](http://www.circa.co/<https:/app.circa.co/signup>)
# Event planning, simplified
With Circa, you can simplify the event planning process at your company and drive measurable success
![Circa hot air balloon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6579f252da1167e4a91bf142/657ac96aea21eae5d381a773_Circa-hero.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6579f252da1167e4a91bf142/657b0344031e9a0e9d90cf00_about-hero.svg)
Features
## All the tools you need to manage events
[View product](http://www.circa.co/</product>)[See pricing](http://www.circa.co/</pricing>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6579f252da1167e4a91bf142/657af1004e2611e84700ff0d_Hex_icon_bg.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6579f252da1167e4a91bf142/657afa29398190b649931c14_Event%20Request%20Forms.svg)
### Event Request Forms
Start a process for ideating events. Tap into your sales team, community, and partners for event ideas. Clearly communicate requirements and review status.
[Learn more![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6579f252da1167e4a91bf142/657af45b7929b6f1c0db02cf_arrow-right%201.svg)](http://www.circa.co/</features/event-request-forms/>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6579f252da1167e4a91bf142/657af1004e2611e84700ff0d_Hex_icon_bg.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6579f252da1167e4a91bf142/657afa2a48c8ac169972b4ad_Customizable%20Event%20Calendars.svg)
### Event Calendars
Empower teams at your company with custom views of the events and related business information that they require.
[Learn more![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6579f252da1167e4a91bf142/657af45b7929b6f1c0db02cf_arrow-right%201.svg)](http://www.circa.co/</features/event-calendars/>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6579f252da1167e4a91bf142/657af1004e2611e84700ff0d_Hex_icon_bg.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6579f252da1167e4a91bf142/657afa2a153c95083d8f195d_Event%20Budgeting.svg)
### Event Budgeting
Plan, track and report event budgets faster and with greater accuracy. Your business and finance leaders will be delighted.
[Learn more![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6579f252da1167e4a91bf142/657af45b7929b6f1c0db02cf_arrow-right%201.svg)](http://www.circa.co/</features/event-budgeting/>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6579f252da1167e4a91bf142/657af1004e2611e84700ff0d_Hex_icon_bg.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6579f252da1167e4a91bf142/657afa290e097c20b72279a0_Event%20Templates.svg)
### Event Templates
Instantly setup events and adapt from feedback. Event Templates are the key to unlocking higher performance from your upcoming events.
[Learn more![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6579f252da1167e4a91bf142/657af45b7929b6f1c0db02cf_arrow-right%201.svg)](http://www.circa.co/</templates>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6579f252da1167e4a91bf142/657af1004e2611e84700ff0d_Hex_icon_bg.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6579f252da1167e4a91bf142/657afa29ebabe3135096167a_Adaptable%20Event%20Checklists.svg)
### Event Checklists
Make quick work of checklist tasks and todos. Adapt templates to accelerate. Hit deadlines more reliably and raise the visibility of your team's progress.
[Learn more![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6579f252da1167e4a91bf142/657af45b7929b6f1c0db02cf_arrow-right%201.svg)](http://www.circa.co/</features/event-checklists/>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6579f252da1167e4a91bf142/657af1004e2611e84700ff0d_Hex_icon_bg.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6579f252da1167e4a91bf142/657afa2b5897a1c4ff4a3de0_Smart%20Event%20Briefs.svg)
### Event Briefs
Publish a summary view of your events. Automatically organized, Briefs proactively answer questions from staff and stakeholders.
[Learn more![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6579f252da1167e4a91bf142/657af45b7929b6f1c0db02cf_arrow-right%201.svg)](http://www.circa.co/</features/event-briefs>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6579f252da1167e4a91bf142/657af92c71220f5b1c14b867_whycirca-657af58dec9da.webp)
### Why Circa?
Circa helps event planners with tens to thousands of events save time, money, and stress.
[Learn more![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6579f252da1167e4a91bf142/657af545073161b8352f3ee3_arrow-right%201_W.svg)](http://www.circa.co/</about>)
## Get started with a free template
![Conference sponsorship](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6579f252da1167e4a91bf142/657af92ca61c7d8b304072ae_blog1-657af529caf8d.webp)
Event Template
### Conference Sponsorship
Optimize conference sponsorship with pre-conference planning, branding efforts, logistical arrangements, on-site strategies, and post-conference follow ups for heightened brand visibility and networking opportunities.
[Get template![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6579f252da1167e4a91bf142/657af45b7929b6f1c0db02cf_arrow-right%201.svg)](http://www.circa.co/</templates/conference-sponsorship>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6579f252da1167e4a91bf142/65b54bd7efbe0d22e14f29fc_Trade%20Show%20Exhibit%20Booth.jpeg)
Event Template
### Trade Show Exhibit
Craft immersive experiences using this checklist, covering concept development, logistical planning, engagement strategies, and post-activation assessments for impactful audience resonance.
[Get template![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6579f252da1167e4a91bf142/657af45b7929b6f1c0db02cf_arrow-right%201.svg)](http://www.circa.co/</templates/trade-show-exhibit>)
![Hosted Conference
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6579f252da1167e4a91bf142/657af92cd2ee44bfae8424dc_eventcard5-657af56d86c4e.webp)
Event Template
### Hosted Conference
Organize a successful conference with this comprehensive checklist, detailing venue arrangements, speaker coordination, marketing efforts, on-site management, and post-conference activities for a memorable event.
[Get template![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6579f252da1167e4a91bf142/657af45b7929b6f1c0db02cf_arrow-right%201.svg)](http://www.circa.co/</templates/hosted-conference>)
## Start a free trial,no credit card required
Lighten your workload today
[Start now](http://www.circa.co/<https:/app.circa.co/signup>)[See pricing](http://www.circa.co/</pricing>)
[![Circa logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6579f252da1167e4a91bf142/65a16ef66da53b312f0f32a7_Circa%20Logo.svg)](http://www.circa.co/</>)

generated_description:
Circa is an event marketing CRM designed specifically for demand generation and field marketing teams. Founded in 2016 as part of Y Combinator’s S16 batch, Circa operates out of Santa Fe, NM, with a compact team of 21 employees. Their mission? To simplify event planning and execution so that sales and marketing teams can effectively engage their customers at any gathering point.

At its core, Circa is all about making the complex process of event management straightforward. It provides a suite of features that enhance collaboration among stakeholders, optimize budgeting, and streamline task planning. For example, their platform offers customizable event calendars, checklists, templates, and budgeting tools—everything you need to turn a brainstorming session into a successful event.

The company is solidly positioned within the sales enablement landscape, making it easier for marketers to tap into ideas from their sales teams and manage the logistics of multiple events simultaneously. Circa’s tools empower users to create structured processes, which reduce the time and stress typically associated with event planning.

Now, with Circa, planning an event isn't just about logistics; it's about measurable success. Whether you’re coordinating a conference sponsorship, preparing for a trade show, or organizing a hosted conference, Circa provides templates that help streamline the entire process. They even offer a free trial for new users—no credit card required—so you can experience firsthand how they lighten your workload.

If you're interested in discovering more, head over to their website at [circa.co](http://www.circa.co). There, you can check out their offerings, get started with event management templates, and see how Circa can help redefine your event marketing approach.
